sqlMap.select: Select count(1) FROM T_Transfer_Main where $and{id = #id#} $and{transfer_number = #transfer_number#} $and{transfer_statue = #transfer_statue#} $and{DateDiff("d",transfer_date, #receive_date_start#) < 0} $and{transfer_date <= dateadd("d",1,#receive_date_end#)} $and{service_id = #service_id#} $and{go_type = #go_type#} $and{settle_type = #settle_type#} $and{connect_type = #connect_type#} $and{transfer_operator = #transfer_operator#} $and{transfer_memo = #transfer_memo#}
sqlMap.update: update T_Transfer_Main set id=#id# ,transfer_number=#transfer_number# ,transfer_statue=#transfer_statue# ,transfer_date=#transfer_date# ,service_id=#service_id# ,go_type=#go_type# ,settle_type=#settle_type# ,connect_type=#connect_type# ,transfer_operator=#transfer_operator# ,transfer_memo=#transfer_memo# WHERE id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: delete FROM T_Transfer_Main WHERE id IN(#ids#)
